overview_of_class: This course will be a comprehensive survey of social psychological research. We will cover all of the major topic areas of the field, including attitudes and social cognition (how we think about, understand, and evaluate the social environment), interpersonal processes (e.g., romantic attraction, social influence, helping, and aggression), and group processes (e.g., conformity, group performance, cooperation, competition, and prejudice).
name: Social Psychology
class_attributes:
Social & Behavioral Sciences Distro Area

Attendance at 1st class mandatory
subject: PSYCH
